text: tried making custom patches for denim jackets once turns out hustle ≠ profit unless you got like major clout or hook up with big fish tbh gotta grind smarter not harder
reselling thrift finds turns up decent profit, sorta treasure hunting tbh
haha think being a designer's just sketching pretty dresses all day? naah mate it’s more like 90% hunting for fabric suppliers who won’t ghost you last minute 🙄
friend maxed out credit card on rare sneaker drops - talk about pricey hobbies!
